alert.note: Alert for Northern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL WILL COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monee, or near Frankfort, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Joliet, Orland Park, Tinley Park, New Lenox, Mokena, Frankfort, Frankfort Square, Manhattan, and Monee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
